item.title: EP 130 - The Ghost Blimp
item.itunes:title: The Ghost Blimp
item.description:
Today we look the birth of a mechanical god, and then take a ride on the mysterious "Ghost Blimp" that crashed into San Francisco!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

"The New Motive Power" was its name. And it's purpose? To bring utopia to Earth. Was Ben Franklin's ghost really trying to usher in a new era of peace?

Then we travel to San Francisco during World War 2. Big Ole Blimps patrol the coast looking for Japanese subs. But when one of them crashes into the city, the question on everyone's mind is . . .where is the crew?

LINKS:

The Bizarre Mechanical Messiah of John Murray Spear

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2014/06/the-bizarre-mechanical-messiah-of-john-murray-spear/

The Building Of The God Machine

https://www.bibliotecapleyades.net/cienciareal/cienciareal41.htm

The New Motor: Building John Murray Spear’s ‘God Machine’ in Lynn, Massachusetts

http://weekinweird.com/2010/08/10/the-new-motor-building-the-god-machine/

The Bizarre Tale Of The World War II Ghost Blimp And Its Missing Crew

https://allthatsinteresting.com/ghost-blimp

Reddit Lays 70-Year-Old Unsolved Blimp Mystery To Rest In One Comment

https://jalopnik.com/reddit-lays-70-year-old-unsolved-blimp-mystery-to-rest-883224308

Mystery of the Ghost Blimp

http://www.historynet.com/mystery-of-the-ghost-blimp.htm

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black
"As Above" Art By Grant Scott
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
